alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a 1,2,3-triazole that carries a sulfamoyl group at the 1-position.
alternative_parents.name: 1-sulfamoyl-1,2,3-triazoles

alternative_parents.description: Imidazoles in which the imidazole ring is substituted at for positions 1,2,4, and 5.
alternative_parents.name: 1,2,4,5-tetrasubstituted imidazoles

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a benzene ring which bears a methane group.
alternative_parents.name: Toluenes

alternative_parents.description: Heterocyclic compounds containing an imidazole ring substituted at position 1.
alternative_parents.name: N-substituted imidazoles

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the acyl chloride functional group.
alternative_parents.name: Aryl chlorides

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing an aromatic ring where a carbon atom is linked to an hetero atom.
alternative_parents.name: Heteroaromatic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds having the structure RC#N; thus C-substituted derivatives of hydrocyanic acid, HC#N.
alternative_parents.name: Nitriles

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an heterocycle with at least one nitrogen atom and one carbon atom linked to each other.
alternative_parents.name: Azacyclic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a bond between carbon a pnictogen atom. Pnictogens are p-block element atoms that are in the group 15 of the periodic table.
alternative_parents.name: Organopnictogen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and a chlorine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organochlorides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an oxide group.
alternative_parents.name: Organic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

class.description: Organic compounds comprising a five-member nitrogen heterocyclic ring containing at least one other non-carbon atom of either nitrogen, sulfur, or oxygen.
class.name: Azoles

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as phenylimidazoles. These are polycyclic aromatic compounds containing a benzene ring linked to an imidazole ring through a CC or CN bond.

direct_parent.description: Polycyclic aromatic compounds containing a benzene ring linked to an imidazole ring through a CC or CN bond.
direct_parent.name: Phenylimidazoles

intermediate_nodes.description: Heterocyclic compounds containing an imidazole ring substituted at one or more positions.
intermediate_nodes.name: Substituted imidazoles

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Compounds containing an imidazole ring, which is an aromatic five-member ring with two nitrogen atoms at positions 1 and 3, and three carbon atoms.
subclass.name: Imidazoles

superclass.description: Compounds containing a ring with least one carbon atom and one non-carbon atom.
superclass.name: Organoheterocyclic compounds
